question: Who has recently been appointed as the new Vice Chief of Army Staff, India?
explanation:
Lieutenant General SK Saini has recently been appointed as the new Vice Chief of Army Staff, after the then Army Vice Chief Lt Gen MM Naravane was appointed as the Chief of Army Staff. LG S K Saini is set to take over as the new Vice Chief on January 25.
In his military career spanning 36 years, Saini has held several crucial staff designations and international deputations.He is serving as the Chief of the Southern Command of Indian Army, at present. The appointment was made and announced by the newly constituted Department of Military Affairs headed by Chief of Defence Staff (CDS) General Bipin Rawat.
